document_data.caption: ''A map depicting the Dust Road, circa [[1479 DR]].''
document_data.name: Dust Road
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dust Road''', also known as the '''Road of Dust''', was a commercial road running through [[Southeast Faer没n]] and [[East Faer没n]].
document_data.Description:
In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Road of Dust linked the [[Great Rift]], [[Unther]] and [[Mulhorand]]. From south to northeast, it linked [[Eartheart]] and [[Delzimmer]], [[Hardcastle (Shaar)|Hardcastle]], [[Unthalass]], [[Gheldaneth]], [[Neldorild]] and [[Skuld]].

With the dissolution of Mulhorand  and the destruction of Unther and the Great Rift after the [[Spellplague]] of [[1385 DR]], the Dust Road became part of the new nations of [[East Rift]], [[Tymanther]] and [[High Imaskar]].

The road was rebuilt by the Tymantherans{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Hand of Darkness|37-38}}

With the restoration of Mulhorand after the [[Second Sundering]], in [[1487 DR]], the Dust Road served as the link between the southern [[dwarf|dwarven]] cities, Tymanther and Mulhorand.

The Dust Road was specially dangerous near the [[Black Ash Plain]], as [[ash giant|ash giants]] were known to frequently attack caravans.
